name: HIGH LOW INFINITE
description:
A small game where you have to guess if the next card you reveal is higher or lower than the previous one.

Each set of puzzles has 5 stages, each stage harder than the previous one.

There are four individual difficulty modifiers that you can tweak  in the settings as you see fit.  (Difficulty level can go from 0 to 7)

How high can you set the difficulty and still beat the game?

---

HOW TO PLAY

1. Reveal a number.
2. Guess if the next number is higher or lower.
3. Repeat until all numbers are revealed.

- The numbers go from 1 to 16.
- Each number appears only once.
- You have 3 lives.
- Difficulty increases with each stage.
- Sometimes you get unlucky.
